LanguageData.TweaksGalore.CannotDoThisWork: {0} is only capable of doing this work to a limited skill level.
LanguageData.TweaksGalore.IsIncapableOfViolenceLower: {0} is non-violent and not assigned a weapon
LanguageData.TG_HunterLacksWeaponDesc: A hunter does not have a weapon.\n\nWhile they can still perform their job, it is highly recommended to give them a weapon.
LanguageData.TweaksGalore.PawnTraderDesc: Traders from these factions are visiting the colony:\n\n{0}
LanguageData.TweaksGalore.DefaultsRestoredRestartRequ: Tweaks Galore: '{0}' tweaks restored to defaults. Restart required to take full effect.
LanguageData.TweaksGalore.TechprintCountNote: The techprint count controls how many techprints are needed to fully unlock the research project. Setting to 0 means no tech prints will be needed.
LanguageData.TweaksGalore.TechprintNoFactions: No factions hold techprints for this research. If this is the default, it may be they are obtained through other means than Royalty typically uses.
